name: Success Center San Francisco
description: Success Center San Francisco (SCSF) was founded in 1983 by Superior Court Judges to provide vocational services to youth detained at Log Cabin Ranch. Since then it has grown to serve any young person in need, with a strong focus on TAY who are, or have been, involved in the justice or foster care systems. In 2014, SCSF assumed management of the Western Addition One-Stop Jobs Center, expanding its services to include adults and seniors. Today, SCSF's Board-approved mission is â€œto empower margin
fullDescription: Success Center San Francisco (SCSF) was founded in 1983 by Superior Court Judges to provide vocational services to youth detained at Log Cabin Ranch. Since then it has grown to serve any young person in need, with a strong focus on TAY who are, or have been, involved in the justice or foster care systems. In 2014, SCSF assumed management of the Western Addition One-Stop Jobs Center, expanding its services to include adults and seniors. Today, SCSF's Board-approved mission is â€œto empower margin
whatTheyOffer: Success Center's' mission is to empower marginalized community members through education, employment, and art. Services include employment support, education, housing support, and the arts. NOTE: All facilities services are available by appointment ONLY: [Schedule Appointment] (https://outlook.office365.com/owa/calendar/SuccessCenters1@successcenters.org/bookings/)
